desc: Get comfortable with the Visual Studio 2008 testing environment and produce reliable software products. This book is for Microsoft developers working with Visual Studio 2008 who need to create a structured testing environment for their applications. No prior knowledge of testing is expected. The reader will need to be familiar with the standard Visual Studio 2008 environment, but anyone who has entered and compiled code in this environment before will easily follow what goes on.
title: Software Testing with Visual Studio Team System 2008
